events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will be reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been successfully categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to help you through the hiring process.
The initial screening of your engineering skills and experience went well, and we are interested in moving forward.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirmation to proceed with the technical interview stages.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 5th at 10 AM UTC with our lead software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and other relevant employment details.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
We have proposed you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer role, including salary and benefits details.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about potentially joining the team.
You accepted the job offer enthusiastically, signaling the final step before onboarding begins.
The onboarding process has started, welcoming you to the engineering team and preparing your workstation.
The recruitment case is now officially closed with your successful hire and integration into the engineering department.
